```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(httr)

```

##Scrape a table

I want the first table from 

read in the html
```{r}
url = "http://samhda.s3-us-gov-west-1.amazonaws.com/s3fs-public/field-uploads/2k15StateFiles/NSDUHsaeShortTermCHG2015.htm"

drug_use_html=read_html(url)
```

extract the table(s)

```{r}
table_marj=
drug_use_html %>% 
  html_nodes(css="table") %>% 
  first() %>% 
  html_table() %>% 
  slice(-1) %>% 
  as_tibble()
```
